events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred on April 28th involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after verifying keywords such as vehicle and collision in the initial report.
Claims agent John Smith was assigned to manage the customer's accident claim promptly to ensure faster resolution.
Customer was sent an acknowledgment message confirming receipt of the accident claim and providing next steps.
Requested the customer to submit photos of vehicle damage, police report, and insurance details related to the collision.
Customer provided all requested documents, including accident photos and official police collision report for review.
Internal investigation team began reviewing submitted documents and contacted involved parties to verify accident details.
Investigation was successfully completed confirming liability and the extent of vehicle damage following the collision.
A settlement offer was proposed based on damage assessment and policy coverage for the auto accident claim.
Customer responded with positive feedback appreciating the swift handling and clear communication throughout the process.
Claim approval was granted authorizing payment for vehicle repairs as per the settlement agreement.
The payment for the approved auto accident claim was issued promptly to the customer's designated bank account.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after successful payment and confirmation of vehicle repairs.
All records related to the auto accident claim were archived for future reference and compliance requirements.
